# add the math library
if(FC_CUDA_SUPPORT)
  cuda_add_library(feat2d ${src_feat2d})
else(FC_CUDA_SUPPORT)
  add_library(feat2d ${src_feat2d})
endif(FC_CUDA_SUPPORT)

target_compile_options(feat2d PRIVATE ${Fortran_FLAGS})
